channel.title: git on JJasonClark.com
channel.description: Recent content in git on JJasonClark.com

item.title: Searching a Git repository using VIM
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: Searching Git repositories is very simple using the Fugitive and Unimpaired plug-ins. They allow you to jump to each file and line in the result set with default keybindings.

item.title: Converting a Sourceforge project to Github
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: I was looking for a reason to play with Git more so I thought a good exercise would be to convert an open source project not already using Git. At the same time I put it on Github for easy access.
